title: Kyler Murray options, NFL Prospect Andrew Stueber, Pickett visits Lions, and Baker Mayfield speaks
itunes:title: Kyler Murray options, NFL Prospect Andrew Stueber, Pickett visits Lions, and Baker Mayfield speaks
description:
The Good Morning Football Podcast begins with continued drama around Kyler Murray.  Hosts Kay Adams, Kyle Brandt, Peter Schrager and 13yr NFL veteran Brian Baldinger discuss Murray possibly not playing for the Cardinals until a new contract is given or a trade is worked out.  We look back at 'sage' tweets from fans after past Draft picks.  NFL Prospect Andrew Stueber drops by the studio to discuss his football journey from CT to Michigan and now the NFL.  The Lions will visit with QB Kenny Pickett, but how much interest will Detroit have in a QB?  We wrap the week with Baker Mayfield's podcast appearance and what the Browns will do next.  

The Good Morning Football Podcast is part of the NFL Podcast Network.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
